article.headline: Kroger's home delivery service to add thousands of items this fall through marketplace partnership
article.body: Kroger Co. KR, +0.46% said Tuesday that its home delivery service Kroger Ship has partnered with marketplace platform Mirakl starting this fall. The partnership will add 50,000 items from third-party sellers to the Kroger lineup. New items will include organic merchandise, international food, housewares and toys. Kroger stock has gained nearly 21% for the year to date while the S&P 500 index SPX, +0.87% is up 4% for the period.
